attributes.additional_details: I/We want to stop the former RAF Base at Coltishall being turned back into farmland and the runway dug up.It is important that it is turned into a living monument to all the people who served there,gave their lives for.We would also like to find out exactly what the local authorities have been doing in regards to several bids for the site that have been turned down.And, why they are interested in it,their proposals for the site do not ring true or make finacial sense.This is of a lot of importance to the local economy and area.We do not have to long to save this Historical Air Base,please support and join this petition.ASAP.Thank you.
